title: Gentleman
description: Book Three in the Blue Moon House SeriesHarry's StoryHarrold lives an empty life. He has no joy in his marriage, no love of his work. His only reprieve is found at the hands of the whores, the ones he pays to beat and debase him. Upon being accepted into Blue Moon House, he learns the real cost for his desires, and what underlying need is really aching to be filled.Could you be an equal and a subordinate at the same time?How long would you hold out if you knew what you wanted would be paid for in blood?
author: Angelica Dawson
